snippet.title: The Last Stand: Aftermath
snippet.description:
You're going to die, but not until you're good and ready.
Back the Last Stand: Aftermath on Kickstarter: http://armor.ag/tlsat-kickstarter

From the creators of The Last Stand: Dead Zone comes an all-new singleplayer rogue-lite action adventure. Infected by the affliction that ravaged humanity, you set out to explore the apocalypse and find hope for your fellow survivors. Even like this, you can still make a difference. Don’t give up.
